subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Ankles (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: Signed Tuesday by the Giants to bolster a secondary that had been hit hard by injuries, J.R. Reed, whose career has been hampered by injuries, is simply enjoying wearing a jersey at all.
snippet: Signed Tuesday by the Giants to bolster a secondary that had been hit hard by injuries, J.R. Reed, whose career has been hampered by injuries, is simply enjoying wearing a jersey at all.
